mapper.insert: insert into V_HIS_CLINIC_DIAGNOSIS_INFO (PATIENT_ID, OUTPATIENT_NO, DIAGNOSIS_ORDER, DIAGNOSIS_DATE, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, DOCTOR_CODE, DOCTOR_NAME, DIAGNOSTIC_TYPES, ICD_CODE, ICD_NAME, DIAGNOSIS_RESULT, BODY_WEIGHT, TEMPERATURE, PULSE, RESPIRATION, BLOOD_PRESSURE_LOW, BLOOD_PRESSURE_HIGH, CHIET_COMPLAINT, PRESENT_HISTORY, PAST_HISTORY, DRUG_ALLERGY_HISTORY, TREATED, PRECAUTIONS, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DIAGNOSIS_NAME, QUERYBODY, ONSET_DATE, IS_DOUBT, IS_REFERRAL, SUGGEST) values (#{patientId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outpatientNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisOrder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doctorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosticTypes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icdCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icdName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bodyWeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pulse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{respiration,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodPressureLow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodPressureHigh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chietComplaint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{presentHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pastHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drugAllergyHistory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{treated,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{precautions,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosisName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{querybody,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onsetDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDoubt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isReferral,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{suggest,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select PATIENT_ID, OUTPATIENT_NO, DIAGNOSIS_ORDER, DIAGNOSIS_DATE, DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, DOCTOR_CODE, DOCTOR_NAME, DIAGNOSTIC_TYPES, ICD_CODE, ICD_NAME, DIAGNOSIS_RESULT, BODY_WEIGHT, TEMPERATURE, PULSE, RESPIRATION, BLOOD_PRESSURE_LOW, BLOOD_PRESSURE_HIGH, CHIET_COMPLAINT, PRESENT_HISTORY, PAST_HISTORY, DRUG_ALLERGY_HISTORY, TREATED, PRECAUTIONS, DIAGNOSIS_CODE, DIAGNOSIS_NAME, QUERYBODY, ONSET_DATE, IS_DOUBT, IS_REFERRAL, SUGGEST from V_HIS_CLINIC_DIAGNOSIS_INFO
